short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically clicks a specified number of checkboxes on a webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto Checkbox Clicker is a lightweight and efficient tool that helps you automatically check multiple checkboxes on any webpage. Perfect for filling out forms, surveys, or any task requiring multiple checkbox selections.

Key Features:
- Click up to any number of checkboxes with one click
- User-friendly interface with customizable checkbox count
- Works on any webpage
- Only clicks unchecked boxes to prevent duplicate actions
- Shows completion notification with number of boxes clicked

How to Use:
1. Click the extension icon
2. Enter the number of checkboxes you want to check
3. Click "Click Checkboxes" button
4. Done! The extension will automatically check the specified number of boxes

Perfect for:
- Survey completion
- Form filling
- Data entry tasks
- Website testing
- Any repetitive checkbox tasks
